overview: Young, Latino twinks in horny bareback action.Bareback Kidnapping is not about violent crime at all. It gets its name from the sheer youthfulness of the male models on display! These kids are, we are told, fresh out of college - but they look younger! Dark and Latin-looking, theyre as pretty as a picture. Its amazing how such slight, slender youths can pack such big, thick cocks!
title: Bareback Kidnapping
